title: Sainou Nashi To Iwareta Ossan Tamer Wa, Ai Musume To Tomo Ni Musou Suru
alternative_title: A Middle-Aged Tamer Who Was Said to Have No Talent Becomes Invincible With His Beloved Daughter! ; Sainou Nashi to Iwareta Ossan Tamer wa, Ai Musume to Tomo ni Musou Suru ~ Hirotta Musume ga Sainou Sugite Boukensha ni Scout Sareta Kedo, Shinpai Nanode Tsute Ikimasu~ ; 才能なしと言われたおっさんテイマーは、愛娘と共に無双する！
status: A Middle-Aged Tamer Who Was Said to Have No Talent Becomes Invincible With His Beloved Daughter! ; Sainou Nashi to Iwareta Ossan Tamer wa, Ai Musume to Tomo ni Musou Suru ~ Hirotta Musume ga Sainou Sugite Boukensha ni Scout Sareta Kedo, Shinpai Nanode Tsute Ikimasu~ ; 才能なしと言われたおっさんテイマーは、愛娘と共に無双する！
description:
Description :
        Oud, an old man who was told he had no talent and could not become an adventurer, was running a hunting business in the countryside. However, one day, a girl he picked up in the woods changed his life...? This father-daughter adventure with his beloved daughter is about to begin!
